english.segment1: Dont let your life slip through the cracks in your hand. If you hold on tight you might stand a chance
english.segment2: Dont be yourself if youre not someone you like. Theres hope for change in anyones life
english.segment3: The paper skin Im living in it tells the truth, it proves Im broken. This paper skin, so frail so thin and every touch can tear me open. La la la la la la la la la, La la la la la la la la
english.segment4: Dont make your love suffer insecurity. Trade the baggage of self to set another man free
english.segment5: Dont dream out loud you never know who will hear. Delight in bringing you down and fill your head with their fears
english.segment6: On paper skin words wont rescind they sink too deep and slice me open. In paper skin I never mend it bends me back until Im broken. La la la la la la la la la, La la la la la la la la
